title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services       Discover Your Northwest, our nonprofit partner, operates a bookstore in the Thomas Condon Paleontology Center at the Sheep Rock Unit. Items for sale include: Books T-shirts Hats Posters Prints Magnets Toys Reusable Water Bottles Pins Patches Stickers Maps Postcards  Some of these items are only available at the John Day Fossil Beds location.
